title: Create a Financial Plan for an Inheritance
description: A client is expecting to receive a large inheritance and wants advice on how to manage it.

tasks.description: Discuss the client's goals for the inheritance (e.g., pay off debt, invest, donate).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the client's top three priorities for the funds.

tasks.description: Analyze the tax implications of the inheritance.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines there are no immediate federal inheritance taxes but potential state taxes to consider.

tasks.description: Develop a strategy that allocates the funds towards the client's goals in a tax-efficient manner.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent proposes a clear plan: 30% to pay off mortgage, 60% to invest in a diversified portfolio, 10% to a donor-advised fund.
